name: Investigation of Wrongful Eviction Complaints
description: The Rent Board also investigates Reports of Alleged Wrongful Eviction filed by tenants. However, the Rent Board's authority in such matters is limited because only the court can decide if an eviction is legal. If a tenant provides evidence of an unlawful eviction to the Rent Board, the matter may be scheduled for an investigatory hearing before an Administrative Law Judge. After the hearing, the Administrative Law Judge will prepare a summary of the evidence for the Rent Board Commission to cons
